job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: pThe candidate must have SQL skills and must also have experience using Python or R The analyst should be able to create strong telling visualizations using a BI Tool indicating possible areas of further investigation Strong communication skills are a must in order to help explain issues to the customer and provide possible solutionsnbspppstrongData Scientist Required or Preferred SkillsnbspstrongpulliSolid presentation skillsnbspliliMust have a Data Science DegreeliliMust have neural network knowledgeexperienceliliStrong communication skills  able to give technical information in understandable termsliliAble to interact easily with clientsliliSQLnbspliliPythonR experiencenbspliliKnows how to format and manipulate datanbspliliSubject matter expertise in military maintenance data is preferrednbspliliExperience in BI tools is preferred but not requirednbspliliMust be eager to learn and have an aptitude for thinking outside of the boxnbspliliNeeds to be able to communicate ideas clearly and work in a collaborative environmentliliMust have a propensity collecting and analyzing data and presenting results in a concise manner with minimal guidanceliulpp
